How do you trade?


Station Trading

Finding the most profitable items to buy low, and then sell high without leaving the station.

Station Trade at

Suggestions: Jita Amarr Dodixie Rens Hek

Volume Above

Return margins above

and below

A station is required.

Station to Station Trading

Finding the most profitable trade routes based on given filter parameters.
Orders change frequently. Profit is not guaranteed. Verify prices are accurate.

Hold Shift to add all stations in a system.
The more systems added, the longer the query will take.

Starting Station(s)

Suggestions: Jita Amarr Dodixie Rens Hek

Ending Station(s)

Suggestions: Jita Amarr Dodixie Rens Hek

A starting point, and at least one destination is required. Starting point cannot equal Destination.

Region to Region Trading

Finding the most profitable trade routes based on given filter parameters.
Orders change frequently. Profit is not guaranteed. Verify prices are accurate.

Starting Region

Destination Region


A starting region, and a destination is required.

Deal finding is dependant on connection speed and number of filters.
Best viewed on a laptop or desktop.

    The EVE Online Hauling & Station Trading Tool

    Route or Station Trading?

    Route / Hauler Trading

    Find best trades between two trade hubs. Buying sell orders at one, and selling them directly to buyers at the other. These trades can happen immediately.

    For more information see: Hauling 101

    Station Trading

    Placing buy orders at a station for the buy price. Once the buy order is filled, you sell the items at the same station for the cheapest price. This is a slower process but requires nothing but capital. No ships or storage requirements.

    For more information see: Station Trading 101

    Are character skills taken into consideration?

    No. Verify that ROI is not negative when considering tax and broker fees. When in doubt set ROI to 5%.

    Route Trading UI Information

    Highlight an item to be tracked

    Click the row


    Sort on a column

    Click the header


    Multi-sort on an additional column

    Shift + Click the header


    How to trade between Systems instead of just Stations?
    1. Select Station to Station trading.
    2. Type the System or Station you are interested in.
    3. Hold Shift.
    4. All stations in that system or station's system will be added to the list.
    5. You can also hold shift and click on a trade hub to add the whole trade hub to the list.

    Station Trading UI Information

    Highlight an item to be tracked

    Click the row


    Sort on a column

    Click the header

    Standalone Application

    The full application is now available for use on your Desktop.

    Please note that this application is a BETA and an internet connection is still required.

    Critical bugs will be addressed but not as quickly as bugs on the website.

    To use just download, unzip, and double click the .exe file
